description:
Windows port of Easydict - Dictionary and translation app

Windows port of Easydict translation app. Supports 15+ translation services (Google, DeepL, OpenAI, Gemini, etc.), global hotkeys, multiple window modes, clipboard monitoring, and LLM streaming. Self-contained application with system tray support.
What's Changed (v0.3.4 ...v0.4.0)
Bug Fixes
- fix: update UI automation test filters to use FullyQualifiedName for improved accuracy
- fix: enhance UI automation tests with sharding for improved parallel execution
- fix: update version to 0.3.4 for Easydict WinUI
- fix: optimize async calls with ConfigureAwait(false) for improved performance
- fix: prevent UI thread blocking during translation
Other
- bump: update version to 0.4.0 in project files
- Replace loading ring with cancel icon during translation queries (#78)
- Add support for additional languages and dynamic language selection (#77)
- Add support for 8 new UI languages (vi, th, ar, id, it, ms, hi, da) (#76)
